about_the_game:
" Contrary to most expectations,
and even our most distant fictions,
we have solved the biggest basic problems of our civilization, and many others,
and now we are living the beginning of a new and very different era,
of much less pain and much more harmony for the human world.
But they arrived... "

Crack Spaceships:
Several enemy spaceship types, each with different weapons and aproachs to destroy you,
and a Boss Keeper of each "World".

Improve your Tank
Make your tank for your gameplay style,
with various specialties and their levels of upgrade:

- (6) Six Different Main Weapons;
- (3) Three Types of Super Weapons;
- (4) Four Main tank estructures ;
- (4) Four "Defense" gadget types;
- Colors and Paintings;

______

Discover and walk around fantasy and also known "Worlds" of the Solar System:
More than 5 worlds each with 3 different different moments, and several stages;

Choose, and get more Lead Pilots to the Resistence:
Release more lead pilots to drive your tank when reaching different worlds(depending on the chosen difficulty level), through the defense campaign against the invading aliens.
Each Lead Pilot with their own characteristics .

______

(3) Three Game Modes:
- 8-Bit times / game mode based in lives like in the old video games ;
- Rogue Survive / gaining levels of moral points you can choose upgrades and resources cards to your tank, checkpoints just between worlds ;
- Persistent gain / where everything you advance is saved for when you play again ;

(3) Three Game Difficulty levels.

(2) Two bonus stage types.

Chain combo system to Score.

Release New different Visual render Styles for gameplay at the end of each game mode.
